title: Input schema for Instagram profile scraper
description:
Set up Instagram profile scraper to get posts from Instagram profile URL. Get data from Instagram profiles
Important: This scraper doesn't extract emails or any other contact details!

username.title: Instagram usernames
username.description: Provide names or the profile URLs of the accounts you want to scrape the posts from.

resultsLimit.title: Maximum posts
resultsLimit.description: How many posts you want to maximally scrape from each profile. If you set this to 5, you will get 5 posts for each URL provided (if you provide 2 URLs you will get 10 results altogether.
